data.title: トランプ政権の“汚れ役”？ヴァンス副大統領と司法の綱引き
data.description: 私が少しひいきにしているアメリカ副大統領のJDヴァンスの発言が物議を醸しているようだ。 バンス米副大統領が司法を批判し、波紋を呼んでいる。財務省が管理する個人情報に、政府の新組織「政府効率化省」がアクセスすることを差し止めた連邦地裁判事に対し「裁判官が行政の適法な権力を縛ることは許されない」とX（旧ツイッター）に投稿。三権分立の否定とも受け取れる内容に「専制だ」と反発の声が上がっている。バンス氏の司法批判に波紋 三権分立否定と反発 これは、アメリカ政治やトランプ政権のエッセンスがつまっていてなかなか面白い題材なので少し深堀りしてみたい。 そもそも日本語訳は適切なのか？ 原文を見てみたのだが、正…

data.title: Top 10 smallcaps offer up to 10% dividend yield in last one year; check full list - Why dividend yields matter
data.description: Dividends are a big draw for investors who like steady income from their portfolios. The dividend yield, which is calculated by dividing the dividend paid per share by the stock’s current market price, shows how much return you’re getting in the form of payouts.For income-focused investors, higher yields often mean better opportunities. Based on data from Axis Securities, here are 10 small-cap companies across different sectors that stood out for giving strong dividend yields over the past year. Why dividend yields matter

data.title: Powell’s Jackson Hole speech, FII activity among 8 key triggers to move market this week
data.description: Indian stock markets anticipate a week influenced by global and domestic factors. Jerome Powell's speech and Foreign Institutional Investor (FII) activity are crucial. Geopolitical events and domestic data releases, including PMI and GDP figures, will be monitored. Technical levels for Nifty are key, with monthly expiry volatility expected. Rupee movement and crude prices also play a role in market trends.

data.title: Kaun banega mango millionaire? Try Radhika Gupta's 10-30-50 savings rule before investing money
data.description: Radhika Gupta's 'Mango Millionaire' introduces the 10-30-50 savings rule, advocating for a progressive approach to wealth building. The framework suggests saving 10% of income in your 20s, increasing to 30% in your 30s and 40s, and reaching 50% from your 40s onwards. Gupta also proposes an automated 'Savings Deducted at Source' system to cultivate consistent saving habits.

data.title: Why is Donald Trump eyeing Chicago for military deployment after LA, Washington?
data.description: The Pentagon is planning to deploy military forces to Chicago amid Trump's crackdown on crime and immigration. The Defense Department is considering activating National Guard troops, while Illinois Governor JB Pritzker argues there is no justification for such action.

data.title: 新作小説 「千四百年の夜を越えて、君と～古都に咲く鎮魂の恋～」: Kanamori Marketing Office
data.description: 新作オリジナル小説を書きました。今度は歴史ロマン・恋愛小説です。千四百年前、つまり、飛鳥時代からの因縁に翻弄される二人の男女の恋を描きました。舞台は奈良。奈良の情景や神道の神事についての描写には自信があります。ダウンロードPDFで読めます。
